homeSubTitle: The seaside haven of warmth, tranquility and restoration

HomeIntro.Header2: In the Heart of the South Pacific, Outstanding Views
HomeIntro.Header3: Nestled in the heart of the Pacific Islands resort, on the edge of a tranquil and beautiful Garden Island, CozyStay is a haven of warmth, tranquility and rejuvenation. Bathed in brilliant sunshine and clear skies, it offers stunning views of palm-lined beaches and gorgeous coral reefs.
HomeIntro.Header4: Inspired by our history, surrounded by nature and designed to offer a different experience

Experience.Header2: One of the World's Most Desirable Locations
Experience.Header3: A superior, 5-star resort embodying the very best of Fiji Islands luxury, tranquility & sophistication.

Experience2.Header2: “Everything here was great: the staff, the room layout, the property amenities with indoor pool, and the quality of the food. But the high point is the view from the mountains.”

HomeServices.title: All the Essentials for a Cozy and Comfortable Stay
HomeServices.footer: Inspired by our history, surrounded by nature to offer a different experience

footer.title2: Sign up for our newsletter to receive our news, deals and special offers

stay.title: Spend an exceptional holiday in paradise when you stay at CozyStay Pacific Hotel.

introSection.Header: Explore our refined accommodation options and find the perfect space for your stay.
introSection.paragraph: The resort offers a total of 139 suites and villas and a wide range of facilities, services and activities to its guests. In an effort to provide a peaceful and tranquil environment.
